title: Differentiated Instruction Design and Practice through Collaborative Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Corporate in-service training program for elementary teachers in language education, focusing on developing practical strategies to address learner diversity in classrooms

learning_goals: Participants can utilize three or more tools to diagnose learner diversity within the classroom
Participants can design five or more collaborative learning strategies for students with varying linguistic and cognitive levels
Participants can revise and improve differentiated instruction implementation plans through two or more peer coaching sessions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
